abstract: New Yorkers share tips on how to keep dogs cool in summer heat.
lead_paragraph: Advice varies from the practical (carry water when you walk them) to odd (goat-milk Popsicles and tiny shoes for their paws).

headline.main: Keeping New York Dogs Cool as the City Heats Up
headline.print_headline: Keeping Dogs Cool in a Hot City

snippet: Advice varies from the practical (carry water when you walk them) to odd (goat-milk Popsicles and tiny shoes for their paws)....
